name: Only Natural Pet Hypoallergenic Shampoo with Aloe & Oatmeal for Dogs - Moisturizing Dog Shampoo and Ultra-Nourishing Care for Dry, Itchy, and Sensitive Skin - 16.9 oz
short_description: HYPOALLERGENIC DOG SHAMPOO: Provide ultra-nourishing care for dry, sensitive skin and coats. No fragrance and plant-based ingredients. Gently cleanses skin and coat without harsh detergents or chemicals, leaving your dog clean and smelling fresh.

MOISTURIZING DOG SHAMPOO: Moisturizing Aloe hydrates sensitive skin while Oatmeal soothes damaged or stressed coats, leaving your dog soft and shiny. Ideal for dogs with allergies, dry or sensitive skin.
PH BALANCED DOG SHAMPOO: PH balanced for dogs using natural ingredients. No Sulfates, Parabens, Phosphates, Phthalates, DEA, Synthetic Dyes or scent.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Wet your dogs coat with warm water. Apply our hypoallergenic dog shampoo and gently massage from head to tail, avoid eyes and ears. Rinse well and towel dry to finish. For optimal results, pair with our Hypoallergenic Conditioner.
HOLISTIC FORMULA: Crafted with a holistic approach by veterinarians using natural ingredients.

name: Skout’s Honor Probiotic Natural Dog Shampoo and Conditioner with Avocado Oil & Omega-3s, Gentle Puppy Shampoo, Hydrating Dog Conditioner, 97% Natural, Paraben & Sulfate-Free, Cruelty-Free, 16 oz
short_description: Premium Grooming Experience – Designed to gently cleanse and hydrate, Skout’s Honor pet shampoo and conditioner leaves your dog’s coat soft, silky, and healthy-looking. A trusted dog shampoo sensitive skin solution and a staple in dog bath supplies.

Probiotic Formula – Best dog shampoo and conditioner for dogs formulated with topical probiotics to support a healthy skin microbiome and help defend against common issues like itching, odor, dryness, dandruff, hot spots, and excessive shedding.

Natural Ingredients – Made with avocado oil and conditioning omega-3s, this 97% natural pet shampoo is free from parabens and sulfates. A gentle deshedding dog shampoo and dog shampoo itchy skin relief you can trust.

Cruelty-Free - Skout's Honor puppy shampoo and conditioner is cruelty-free, ensuring that no animals were harmed in the making of this product. It is the ultimate guilt free dog shampoo for smelly dogs!

Coat Defense for Dogs – Discover our gentle shampoo for dogs, thoughtfully formulated without harsh chemicals that can irritate skin. This hypoallergenic dog shampoo for allergies and itching provides soothing care your dog has been waiting for.

Microbiome-Friendly Certified – A must-have sensitive skin dog shampoo and deodorizing dog shampoo. This certification ensures the dog wash is designed to respect and maintain the skin’s natural microbiome balance.

Soothes Dry, Itchy Skin Naturally – Designed for daily or as-needed bathing, this gentle formula delivers dependable itch relief for dogs by cleansing without stripping natural oils. A calming wash that supports long-term comfort, not just a temporary fix.

Comfort for Dogs Prone to Scratching – From seasonal sensitivities to everyday dryness, this probiotic dog wash provides dependable dog itching skin relief while helping reduce irritation caused by harsh soaps and environmental stressors.

Gentle Defense Without Harsh Actives – Skip medicated cleansers that can disrupt the skin barrier. Our plant-powered, probiotic blend offers anti itch for dogs seeking a balanced, soothing cleanse and consistent itchy dog relief bath after bath.

Everyday Anti-Itch Clean You Can Trust – Formulated as an anti itch dog shampoo that supports the skin’s natural defenses, this wash promotes lasting dog itch relief while keeping coats clean, hydrated, and fresh between grooms.

Oatmeal is known for its exceptional skin-soothing properties, making it an ideal choice for addressing dryness, flakiness, and dandruff in your pet's fur.

ALOE VERA & LAVENDER BLEND: Infused with the calming and refreshing scents of aloe vera and lavender, our dog shampoo oatmeal leaves your pet smelling delightful and feeling exceptionally soft. HYPOALLERGENIC FORMULA: Dogs come in all shapes and sizes, with varying levels of skin sensitivity. This dog allergy shampoo boasts a hypoallergenic formula, ensuring that it's gentle enough for dogs with sensitive skin and prone to allergies. This formula promotes a healthier coat and skin without causing irritation.

Oatmeal and Aloe Vera are recommended by veterinarians to effectively combat skin irritation, promote healing, and re-moisturize sensitive, dry skin. This luxurious shampoo is all natural, soap free and pH-balanced to clean and deodorize safely and thoroughly, leaving your pet's coat and skin brilliantly clean, soft, plush and smelling better than ever before. Will not wash off topical flea applications. Safe for all animals over 6 weeks. Soap free.

Directions Shake well before using. On a wet coat, lather your pet thoroughly with a few good palm-fulls of earthbath® pet shampoo. Remember to eliminate all escape routes well in advance (a tip: once your pet is slippery wet, he or she is suddenly smarter and faster than you are). Work lather from head to tail, paying special attention to irritated areas. Keep out of eyes. Leave on for at least 90 seconds to allow oatmeal and organic aloe vera to work their magic.

name: Wahl USA Dry Skin & Itch Relief Pet Shampoo for Dogs – Oatmeal Formula with Coconut Lime Verbena Scent & Pet Friendly Formula, 24 Oz - Model 820004A
short_description: Made in the USA - Our oatmeal formula pet shampoo is pH balanced, alcohol free, paraben free, PEG-80 free and is highly recommended for moisturizing dry skin & providing itch relief

Oatmeal Formula – This coconut lime verbena scented pet shampoo is great for moisturizing dry skin, cleaning dirty coats, & itch relief. The thick lather rinses off clean & keeps your pet looking and smelling clean

Less is More - Wahl has a higher concentrate of a coconut-derived sodding agent, which means you don’t have to use as much product as other dog shampoos. A little shampoo goes a long way and provides a rich lather that’s easy to rinse off

Allergy Friendly - Our dog icon, Rocket, was designed in the image of our family dog, Cooper — a goldendoodle who has severe allergies. We've found this shampoo to be safe and effective for him. We love the smell too!
The Brand Used By Professionals - Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. As a company of animal lovers, we believe your pet deserves the very best.
product_description: Our shampoos are concentrated, which means a little bit goes a long way! Be sure to thoroughly rinse your dog after shampooing to leave no residual shampoo behind. In addition, it’s important to always comb out and dry your pet's coat; leaving your dog with damp fur for hours can lead to potentional risk for dogs with sensitive skin. Wahl’s Oatmeal formula shampoo contains a coconut lime verbena scent the keeps your pet smelling great! Our shampoo helps gently cleanse, moisturize, & protect your puppy’s delicate skin by providing itch relief. The rich lather helps clean dirty coats and other environmental residue. Since our shampoo easily cleans, it leaves your dog’s coat looking clean, silky, and smooth. Our plant derived ingredients make our shampoo the choice for owners who want to avoid harsh chemicals for their dog and themselves. Our shampoo is PEG-80 free, alcohol free, paraben free, and pH balanced. Our 24 oz size and concentrated formula allows for up to 70% more baths than other leading brands. While there are no harmful chemicals in our pet products, some pets are sensitive to certain plant oils used in our products. Wahl strongly recommends talking to your vet and doing a small spot test on your pet at least 24 hours before using any new product. Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. As a company of animal lovers, we believe your pet deserves the very best.

name: Arm & Hammer for Pets 5-in-1 Pet Shampoo with Conditioner, Vanilla Sandalwood Scent - Deodorizing, Skin Soothing, and Moisturizing Ingredients, Dog Oatmeal Shampoo with Aloe and Shea Butter, 20 Fl Oz
short_description: DID YOU KNOW DOG SKIN DIFFERS FROM HUMAN'S? Dogs' skin is less acidic, so human shampoos destroy a dog's skin protective barrier, leaving your pet vulnerable to itchy flaking. Avoid the itch by using this dog shampoo that’s pH balanced just for dogs!
INFUSED WITH BAKING SODA – Arm & Hammer pet grooming solutions include baking soda, a natural and effective cleanser and deodorizer
TACKLES ODOR AND COAT CARE IN 5 WAYS – This all-in-one dog grooming formula cleanses, deodorize, and condition fur, as well as soothes skin, and moisturizes dry skin
VANILLA SANDALWOOD SCENT – This lightly fragranced dog shampoo leaves a light and earthy vanilla sandalwood scent after each wash
DOG SHAMPOO WITH NO HARSH INGREDIENTS - Arm & Hammer pet products are free of sodium lauryl sulfate, dyes, and parabens
product_description: Unleash the power of baking soda with Arm & Hammer™ grooming products. This 5-in-1 Pet Shampoo cleans and nourishes your dog’s coat 5 ways: 1. Cleansing: At its core, this dog shampoo cuts through dirt and oil to clean your pup’s fur. 2. Deodorizing: Infused with the power of baking soda, this shampoo effectively gets rid of unwanted smells in your dog’s coat. 3. Conditioning: Packed with powerful ingredients to condition a variety of dog fur types, this dog conditioner helps to loosen tangles and makes it easy to brush your pup’s fur for regular grooming. 4. Soothing: This shampoo includes colloidal oatmeal, a preferred ingredient by dog grooming experts for soothing itchy and irritated skin in dogs. 5. Moisturizing: With extra skin moisturizing ingredients like aloe and shea butter, this all-in-one dog grooming solution helps replenish moisture lost during regular grooming or from dry environments. Arm & Hammer™ baking soda particles dissolve and work into the deepest follicles to remove odor for a deep clean and long-lasting scent. Colloidal oatmeal, aloe vera, and shea butter help to condition, soothe, and moisturize skin, leaving you with a cleaner and happier dog! With a light vanilla sandalwood scent that remains on the coat after bathing, you and your dog will be ready for extra cuddles and a fresh new take on the day! WHY PH BALANCE MATTERS FOR DOG SHAMPOO: Dogs' skin is less acidic than human skin, so human shampoos destroy a dog's skin protective barrier, leaving your pet vulnerable to itchy flaking. Arm & Hammer dog grooming products are pH balanced specifically for dogs to maintain a healthy skin barrier, keeping your dog’s coat nourished, healthy, and clean. Directions: Thoroughly wet the dog’s coat with warm water. Apply shampoo and work into a lather from the back of the ears to tail, being careful to avoid contact with eyes. Rinse well.
